name: Global Conference on Biomedical Engineering & Systems
content: BIOMED-2022, the Global Conference on Biomedical Engineering and Systems has been scheduled for September 26 & 28, 2022 in Budapest, Hungary. This meeting focuses on the particular areas of promising technological development in the field of Biomedical Sciences and its systems. We are also very grateful, that this conference is going to incorporate more than 20+ Plenary and Keynote talks, limited to 150-200 attendees, all aim to share the knowledge and effectual discussions among all the speakers. They will address the cutting-edge research and innovation in biomedical engineering, health care technology, R&D, technology transfer and entrepreneurship, and biomedical engineering education. These papers provide unique insights and are regarded as the research forefront of the key research areas in Bio-Robotics, Bio-Mechanics, Biomedical Imaging & Biophotonics, Biosensors & Bio instrumentation, Computational Modeling of Biological Systems, etc.
